Shareholder Name: Gulf Union Insurance and Projects Management Holdings

Abdul Aziz Ali Abdulrahman Al Turki

Description: Gulf Union Cooperative Insurance (known as: Gulf Union) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since September 2007. Gulf Union operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. Gulf Union is based in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2007.
